name: Kitsune Star Gem
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Kitsune/New Racial Rules/Kitsune Magic Items/Kitsune Star Gem

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, creator must be a kitsune

sections.body: This magical jewel glows like faerie fire, shedding light as a candle. It acts as pearl of power, except it only allows a kitsune to recover a spent use of a spell-like ability of the appropriate spell level.
sections.name: Description
